New Records: Mohammad Rizwan reached his 21st T20I fifty
Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 7 wickets
Mohammad Rizwan got out for 55 off 36 balls
Babar Azam got out for 53 off 42 balls
Kane Williamson got out for 46 off 42 balls
Daryl Mitchell got to his T20I half-century
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have been known to perform well in knockout matches
New Zealand have been the team of the tournament so far
Babar Azam has been struggling to score runs in the tournament
Kane Williamson has been accused of dropping too heavy an anchor
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan were outstanding in the last six overs, allowing just 53 runs off those 36 deliveries
Pakistan dominated the match with the bat and the ball
Pakistan were better in the field as well
Pakistan's death bowling trumped New Zealand's hitting
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's supporters in the SCG stands dwarfed the NZ supporters
The ballad of Babar and Kane was discussed before the match
Spin to dominate again at SCG was a topic of discussion before the match
Pakistan's gun fielder Shadab Khan collected the ball on the bounce and threw down the stumps with a direct hit
